content: The **Singapore women's national water polo team** represents [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) in international women's [water polo](/wiki/Water_polo). The team won the gold medal at the [2011 Southeast Asian Games](/wiki/2011_Southeast_Asian_Games) in Indonesia and the silver medal in 2015, 2017 and 2019. ## Results ### World Championships YearHost countryRank(/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2024_World_Aquatics_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_tournament)Qatar16th(/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2025_World_Aquatics_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_tournament)Singapore16th ### Asian Games YearHost countryRank(/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2014_Asian_Games_%E2%80%93_Women)South Korea5th(/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2022_Asian_Games_%E2%80%93_Women)China4th ### Southeast Asian Games YearHost countryRank(/wiki/Aquatics_at_the_2011_Southeast_Asian_Games)Indonesia1st(/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2015_Southeast_Asian_Games_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_tournament)Singapore2nd(/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2017_Southeast_Asian_Games_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_tournament)Malaysia2nd(/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2019_Southeast_Asian_Games_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_tournament)Philippines2nd2023Cambodia2nd2025Thailand2nd ### Asian Water Polo Championship YearHost countryRank(/wiki/2022_Asian_Water_Polo_Championship)Thailand5th(/wiki/2023_Asian_Water_Polo_Championship)Singapore4th(/wiki/2025_Asian_Water_Polo_Championship)China4th(/wiki/2025_Asian_Water_Polo_Championship)India5th ## Current squad Roster for the [2025 World Championships](/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_2025_World_Aquatics_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_tournament). Head coach: Yu Lei - 1 Rochelle Ong GK - 2 Charlene Tio FP - 3 Loh Yu Xuan FP - 4 Yap Jingxuan FP - 5 Koh Ting Ting FP - 6 Nicole Lim FP - 7 Abielle Yeo FP - 8 Heather Lee FP - 9 Kayla Yeo FP - 10 Ong Cheng Jing FP - 11 Wan Celeste FP - 12 Ariel Charis Lim FP - 13 Mounisha Devi GK - 14 Koh Xiao Li FP - Official website This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. title: Singapore women's national water polo team
